languages.text: Конечно, тлетворное влияние Вольного Торговца оскверняло каждую искру веры, зажигавшуюся на Фолстоуне, обращая истовых фанатиков в слепые орудия, а доверчивых — в заблудших предателей. Под благочестивыми масками проповедников скрывались презренные демагоги, заманивавшие паству в пучину ереси.

Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.
languages.original_text: Конечно, тлетворное влияние Вольного Торговца оскверняло каждую искру веры, зажигавшуюся на Фолстоуне, обращая истовых фанатиков в слепые орудия, а доверчивых — в заблудших предателей. Под благочестивыми масками проповедников скрывались презренные демагоги, заманивавшие паству в пучину ереси.

traits.locale_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

languages.text: 当然，行商浪人的腐化影响玷污了荒寂岩地燃起的每一丝信仰的火花。{mf|他|她}将那些狂热分子变成了工具，将轻信之人变成了叛徒。卑鄙的煽动者戴着虔诚的面具，带领羊群走向异端的深渊。
languages.original_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

traits.locale_text: 当然，行商浪人的腐化影响玷污了荒寂岩地燃起的每一丝信仰的火花。{mf|他|她}将那些狂热分子变成了工具，将轻信之人变成了叛徒。卑鄙的煽动者戴着虔诚的面具，带领羊群走向异端的深渊。

languages.text: 当然のことながら、自由開拓者の腐敗した影響力はファウルストーンの信心を汚し、狂信者を手先に、騙されやすい者を裏切り者へと変えた。敬虔な仮面に身を固めた邪なデマが彼らを異端の深淵へと誘ったのだ。
languages.original_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

traits.locale_text: 当然のことながら、自由開拓者の腐敗した影響力はファウルストーンの信心を汚し、狂信者を手先に、騙されやすい者を裏切り者へと変えた。敬虔な仮面に身を固めた邪なデマが彼らを異端の深淵へと誘ったのだ。

languages.text: Bien sûr, l'influence corruptrice {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} souillait chaque étincelle de foi attisée sur Rochepeste, transformant les fanatiques en outils et les gens crédules en traîtres. Derrière une feinte piété, de méprisables démagogues menaient leur troupeau dans l'abîme de l'hérésie.
languages.original_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

traits.locale_text: Bien sûr, l'influence corruptrice {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} souillait chaque étincelle de foi attisée sur Rochepeste, transformant les fanatiques en outils et les gens crédules en traîtres. Derrière une feinte piété, de méprisables démagogues menaient leur troupeau dans l'abîme de l'hérésie.

languages.text: Por supuesto, la influencia corrupta de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente mancillaba cada chispa de fe que brillaba en Rocainmunda, convirtiendo a los devotos en herramientas y a los crédulos en traidores. Con máscaras piadosas, los despreciables demagogos guiaban a sus rebaños al abismo de la herejía.
languages.original_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

traits.locale_text: Por supuesto, la influencia corrupta de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente mancillaba cada chispa de fe que brillaba en Rocainmunda, convirtiendo a los devotos en herramientas y a los crédulos en traidores. Con máscaras piadosas, los despreciables demagogos guiaban a sus rebaños al abismo de la herejía.

languages.text: Natürlich befleckte der korrumpierende Einfluss {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} jeden Funken des Glaubens, der auf Foulstone entzündet wurde. Er machte Eiferer zu Werkzeugen und Naivlinge zu Verrätern. Unter der Maske der Frömmigkeit führten widerwärtige Demagogen ihre Herde in den Abgrund der Ketzerei.
languages.original_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.

traits.locale_text: Natürlich befleckte der korrumpierende Einfluss {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} jeden Funken des Glaubens, der auf Foulstone entzündet wurde. Er machte Eiferer zu Werkzeugen und Naivlinge zu Verrätern. Unter der Maske der Frömmigkeit führten widerwärtige Demagogen ihre Herde in den Abgrund der Ketzerei.

languages.text: Elbette Hür Tacir'in yozlaşmış nüfuzu, Menfurtaş'taki her bir inanç kıvılcımını kirleterek bağnazları birer araca, ahmakları da birer haine dönüştürdü. İnanç maskesini kuşanmış adi demagoglar, takipçilerini kâfirliğin uçurumlarına doğru sürüklediler.
languages.original_text: Of course, the corrupting influence of the Rogue Trader tainted each spark of faith that was kindled on Foulstone, turning the zealots into tools and the gullible into traitors. Donning the masks of piety, despicable demagogues lead their flock into the abyss of heresy.
